citations.narrative:
Two areas for puppies had smooth mesh puppies' feet would sometimes pass through. The licensee reports no known
injuries have occurred with this flooring. Feet passing through openings are at risk for injury. Ensure that measures are
taken so that puppies' feet do not pass through mesh floor openings.
***Correct by 3/13/2024.

citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
The outdoor run for two whelping enclosures had more than one day's worth of animal waste in them (the inside area was
clean). Animal waste (excreta) and food waste must be removed from areas that dogs can touch daily. Daily waste
removal from primary enclosures helps maintain the dogs' living area as a clean and healthy space. Ensure to maintain a
routine of daily excreta and food waste removal from each primary enclosure.
***Correct by 3/12/2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.6(a)(2)(x) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
Two areas for puppies had smooth mesh puppies' feet would sometimes pass through. The licensee reports no known 
injuries have occurred with this flooring. Feet passing through openings are at risk for injury. Ensure that measures are 
taken so that puppies' feet do not pass through mesh floor openings.  
***Correct by 3/13/2024. 
3.11(a) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
The outdoor run for two whelping enclosures had more than one day's worth of animal waste in them (the inside area was 
clean). Animal waste (excreta) and food waste must be removed from areas that dogs can touch daily. Daily waste 
removal from primary enclosures helps maintain the dogs' living area as a clean and healthy space. Ensure to maintain a 
routine of daily excreta and food waste removal from each primary enclosure.  
***Correct by 3/12/2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
